'''Radiant Spincrystal 96''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Simurgh's Dream]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a stack of books in a circular area at the East end of [[Asipattravana Swamp]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]].
